Subject: Is there a way to efficiently search in an ARC file?
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=343342970

Hello,

My task is the following one: I need to search for a specific URL in
the ARC file. From reading the Javadocs it seems there is no facility
for doing this, other than iterating through ALL records and manually
checking the URL all the time. Obviously this is not very nice from a
performance point of view.

Is there any alternative way of doing this? Does someone know of
reasonably modern and maintained tool to do this, or am I just on my
own? If I am, I would appreciate help/hints for implementing this.

Jean-Noel
